description: Display data from the Proxmox host and hosted VM's and Containers.

targets.query: SELECT last(status) AS "Status" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last(cpus) AS "vCPUs" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last("maxmem") /1073741824 AS "Memory (GB)" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT last("maxdisk") /1073741824 AS "Disk (GB)" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "host"
SELECT last(vmid) AS "VMID" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last(pid) AS "PID" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT last(uptime) AS "uptime" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND time > (now() - 10m)  AND uptime > 0 GROUP BY "host" limit 1
SELECT mean("memused")/mean("memtotal") * 100 FROM "memory" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("cpu") FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("mem")/last(maxmem))*100 FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'qemu') AND ("nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Rx", non_negative_derivative(mean("receive"), 10s) AS "Tx" FROM "nics" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "instance" = 'enp2s0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'Backups' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'Hub' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'Proxmox_lvm-thin' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'SaturnPool' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("used") / last("total") FROM "system" WHERE ("host" = 'local' AND "nodename" =~ /^$server$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='nodes'
list.label: Server
list.name: server
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM system WITH KEY=host WHERE object='nodes'

title: Proxmox Summary
